person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Bre-X has a partnership deal with PT Panutan Duta of the Panutan Group run by President Suharto 's eldest son , Sigit Harjojudanto , under which Panutan would receive $ 40 million over 40 months plus a 10 percent stake Busang 's richest parts .

Let's think step by step.

|--------|

| PT Panutan Duta |
| President Suharto |
| Sigit Harjojudanto |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

|--------|

| President Suharto |
| Sigit Harjojudanto |

(Note: PT Panutan Duta is an organization, but it is mentioned in connection with Sigit Harjojudanto, who is a person, so it is included as a Person entity.)
